name: subkiosk
description: Self-Order DEMO Kiosk using React Native and MobX.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && mkdir ./build && react-native bundle --assets-dest ./build --bundle-output ./build/main.jsbundle --dev false --entry-file ./index.js --platform ios
scripts.nuke: yarn run clean && yarn run init
scripts.start: concurrently 'yarn run cli' 'react-native run-ios --simulator="iPad Pro (12.9-inch) (2nd generation) (12.2)"'

author: Luciano Ropero <lropero@gmail.com>
